title: Show current task ID and title in status pane
description:
Display the currently selected/displayed task's ID and title in the status pane.

## Current Behavior

Status pane shows iteration, cost, tokens but no indication of which task is selected.

## Desired Behavior

Status pane includes current task info:

```
Iteration 5 | Task: abc123 - Add authentication | $0.45 | 12.3k tokens
```

Or if space is limited:
```
Iteration 5 | [abc123] Add authentication | $0.45
```

## Implementation

### internal/tui/model.go

In status pane rendering, include selected task:

```go
func (m *Model) renderStatusPane() string {
    // ... existing status info ...
    
    if m.selectedTask \!= nil {
        status += fmt.Sprintf(" | Task: %s - %s", 
            m.selectedTask.ID, 
            truncate(m.selectedTask.Title, 30))
    }
    
    // ...
}
```

## Truncation

If title is long, truncate with ellipsis to fit available width.
acceptance_criteria:
1. Status pane shows selected task ID
2. Status pane shows selected task title (truncated if needed)
3. Updates when selection changes
4. Gracefully handles no selection (e.g., during startup)
5. Doesn't overflow status pane width
